prompts: Create a tiny electric-type Pokemon that has a vibrant yellow body and playful blue eyes.
Imagine a bug-type creature with a bright yellow color and an adorable, round shape.
Design a small Pokemon with a spiky appearance, featuring yellow and blue accents.
Generate a Pokemon that is both electric and bug-type, known for its stealthy nature.
Show me a Pokemon with cute, large eyes and a bright yellow body.
Give me an image of a tiny Pokemon that thrives in grassy habitats and is very energetic.
Make a unique Pokemon that embodies the essence of electricity with a cheerful demeanor.
